title: Simple Calculator
description: A project created to practice and learn modern programming languages by developing a functional calculator app.

title: Simple ToDo List
description: The Simple To-Do List is a basic app that helps users add, view and delete daily tasks. It is easy to use and helps keep tasks organized in one place.

title: Library Management System Java
description: A Java-based console application designed to manage library operations like adding, borrowing, and returning books.

title: conference system
description: A system to organize and manage conferences, including scheduling sessions, speakers, and attendees.

title: Login page
description: The Login Page allows users to securely access the application by entering their username and password. It ensures that only authorized users can use the system.
